rescuecore2.misc.geometry

Class Line2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.misc.geometry.Line2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Indexable

    public class Line2D
extends java.lang.Object
implements Indexable
    A line segment in 2D space. Lines are immutable.

      • getIntersection

        public double getIntersection(Line2D other)
        Find out how far along this line the intersection point with another line is.
        Parameters:
        other - The other line.
        Returns:
        How far along this line (in terms of this line's direction vector) the intersection point is, or NaN if the lines are parallel.
